datasetParam.name: isolate_id
datasetParam.help: Input a comma delimited set of Isolate IDs, or upload a file. Wildcards (*) are allowed.

sqlQuery.name: rflpOntology
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct o.ontology_term_name, o.PARENT_ONTOLOGY_TERM_NAME, decode(o.display_name, 'data set', 'Data Set', o.display_name) as display_name, o.description, o.type, o.units, o.PRECISION, o.is_range from APIDBTUNING.metadata md, apidbtuning.ontology o where md.DATASET_NAME like '%RFLP_RSRC' and o.ontology_term_source_id = md.property_source_id and o.ontology_term_name = 'data set' UNION select 'locus' as ontology_term_name, cast(null as varchar2(1)) as parent_ontology_term_name, 'Genetic Markers' as display_name, 'Loci' as description, null as type, null as units, 1 as precision, 0 as is_range from dual UNION select distinct locus_tag as ontology_term_name, 'locus' as parent_ontology_term_name, locus_tag as display_name, 'Locus' as description, 'string' as type, null as units, 1 as precision, 0 as is_range from apidb.rflpgenotype where locus_tag != 'Origin' -- this is not a locus /** UNION select distinct p.ontology_term_name, p.PARENT_ONTOLOGY_TERM_NAME, p.display_name, p.description, p.type, p.units, p.PRECISION, p.is_range from APIDBTUNING.metadata md, apidbtuning.ontology o, apidbtuning.ontology p where md.DATASET_NAME like '%RFLP_RSRC' and o.ontology_term_source_id = md.property_source_id and o.PARENT_ONTOLOGY_TERM_NAME = p.ONTOLOGY_TERM_NAME **/

sqlQuery.name: rflpMetadata
sqlQuery.sql: select md.pan_id as internal, md.property as ontology_term_name, md.string_value, md.number_value, cast(null as date) as date_value FROM ApidbTuning.Metadata md, apidb.rflpgenotype rg where md.DATASET_NAME like '%RFLP_RSRC' and md.pan_id = rg.protocol_app_node_id UNION select protocol_app_node_id as internal, locus_tag as ontology_term_name, genotype as string_value, cast(null as number) as number_value, cast(null as date) as date_value From apidb.rflpgenotype where locus_tag != 'Origin' -- this is not a locus

sqlQuery.name: withIsolates
sqlQuery.sql: select 'Genotype #' || genotype_number as display, genotype_number as term, genotype_number as internal from (select distinct genotype_number from apidb.RflpGenotypeNumber) order by to_number(replace(replace(replace(genotype_number, 'III', '3'), 'II', '2'), 'I', '1'))

sqlQuery.name: I-II-III
sqlQuery.sql: select 'Don''t Care' as term, 'all' as internal from dual union select genotype as term, genotype as internal from apidb.RflpGenotype where locus_tag = 'BTUB'

sqlQuery.name: I-u-1
sqlQuery.sql: select 'Don''t Care' as term, 'all' as internal from dual union select genotype as term, genotype as internal from apidb.RflpGenotype where locus_tag = 'CS3'

sqlQuery.name: I-II-III-nd
sqlQuery.sql: select 'Don''t Care' as term, 'all' as internal from dual union select genotype as term, genotype as internal from apidb.RflpGenotype where locus_tag = 'Apico'

sqlQuery.name: c29-2
sqlQuery.sql: select 'Don''t Care' as term, 'all' as internal from dual union select genotype as term, genotype as internal from apidb.RflpGenotype where locus_tag = 'c29-2'

sqlQuery.name: c22-8
sqlQuery.sql: select 'Don''t Care' as term, 'all' as internal from dual union select genotype as term, genotype as internal from apidb.RflpGenotype where locus_tag = 'c22-8'

sqlQuery.name: PK1
sqlQuery.sql: select 'Don''t Care' as term, 'all' as internal from dual union select genotype as term, genotype as internal from apidb.RflpGenotype where locus_tag = 'PK1'

sqlQuery.name: SAG1
sqlQuery.sql: select 'Don''t Care' as term, 'all' as internal from dual union select genotype as term, genotype as internal from apidb.RflpGenotype where locus_tag = 'SAG1'
